get.summary: Get or Search for Expense Reports.

400.description: Bad Request - Often due to a missing request parameter

401.description: Unauthorized - An invalid element token, user secret and/or org secret provided

403.description: Forbidden - Access to the resource by the provider is forbidden

404.description: Not found - The requested resource is not found

405.description: Method not allowed - Incorrect HTTP verb used, e.g., GET used when POST expected

500.description: Server error - Something went wrong on the server

parameters.name: x-vendor-authorization
parameters.description: The vendor authorization token

parameters.name: expenseGroupConfigID
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the expense group configuration associated to the report's expense group

parameters.name: hasImages
parameters.description: Determines if the report has at least one expense entry with an entry image or if there is a report image for this report. FORMAT: true or false

parameters.name: hasBillableExpenses
parameters.description: The IsBillable flag for at least one expense entry in the report. FORMAT: true or false.

parameters.name: hasAttendees
parameters.description: Determines if the report has at least one expense entry with an attendee. FORMAT: true or false

parameters.name: expenseTypeCode
parameters.description: The expense type code that is the expense type for at least one expense entry in the report. Use ExpenseTypeCode from Response of GET Expense Group Configurations V3.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The report country. Maximum 2 characters. Format: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Example: United States is US.

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for the report currency. Example: USD.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: hasVAT
parameters.description: Determines if the report has at least one expense entry with VAT details. FORMAT: true or false.

parameters.name: isTestUser
parameters.description: The report owner is a test user using the report for testing purposes in a non-production environment. FORMAT: true or false.

parameters.name: modifiedDateAfter
parameters.description: The report modified date is after this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: modifiedDateBefore
parameters.description: The report modified date is before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: paidDateAfter
parameters.description: The report paid date is after this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: userDefinedDateAfter
parameters.description: The report user defined date is after this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the report owner(s) to use when searching for reports.

parameters.name: paidDateBefore
parameters.description: The report paid date is before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: submitDateBefore
parameters.description: The report submit date is before this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: submitDateAfter
parameters.description: The report submit date is after this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: reimbursementMethod
parameters.description: The method the report owner will be reimbursed. VALUES: ADPPAYR - ADP Payroll; APCHECK - AP (Company Check); CNQRPAY - Expense Pay; PMTSERV - Other Payment Service. NOTE: PAY_PAL is NOT supported.

parameters.name: processingPaymentDateBefore
parameters.description: The report processing payment date is before this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: processingPaymentDateAfter
parameters.description: The report processing payment date is after this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: paymentType
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the payment type that is the payment type for at least one expense entry in the report.

parameters.name: paymentStatusCode
parameters.description: The payment status code for the report

parameters.name: createDateBefore
parameters.description: The report create date is before this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: createDateAfter
parameters.description: The report create date is after this date.Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: attendeeTypeCode
parameters.description: The report contains expense entries that have attendees of the specified type.

parameters.name: approverLoginID
parameters.description: The login ID for the report approver that is the current approver assigned to the report.

parameters.name: approvalStatusCode
parameters.description: The status code for the Approval Status

parameters.name: userDefinedDateBefore
parameters.description: The report user defined date is before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: The Vendor Description that is the vendor for at least one expense entry in the report.

parameters.name: batchID
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a payment batch where there is at least one report payee within the report. Use the BatchID from Response of GET Payment Batch List.

parameters.name: costObject
parameters.description: The list item code for an allocation field for at least allocation in the report.

parameters.name: entryTransactionDateAfter
parameters.description: The entry transaction date for at least one expense entry in the report is after this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: entryTransactionDateBefore
parameters.description: The entry transaction date for at least one expense entry in the report is before this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

get.summary: Get or Search for Expense Reports.

400.description: Bad Request - Often due to a missing request parameter

401.description: Unauthorized - An invalid element token, user secret and/or org secret provided

403.description: Forbidden - Access to the resource by the provider is forbidden

parameters.name: x-vendor-authorization
parameters.description: The vendor authorization token

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list this item is a member of.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of this item's parent. Is empty when there is no parent.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the listItem. Text Max length: 64.

parameters.name: level5Code
parameters.description: The item code for the fifth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level4Code
parameters.description: The item code for the fourth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level3Code
parameters.description: The item code for the third level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level2Code
parameters.description: The item code for the second level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level1Code
parameters.description: The item code for the first level of the list. All lists have at least a Level1Code. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level10Code
parameters.description: The item code for the tenth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level6Code
parameters.description: The item code for the sixth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level7Code
parameters.description: The item code for the seventh level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level8Code
parameters.description: The item code for the eighth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level9Code
parameters.description: The item code for the ninth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Text maximum 32 characters
